regen.absent_element: situation where status changes to 'open' without an operator command
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the sequence if the status of a closure device, previously closed at the current entrance, changes to 'open' without an operator-initiated command.

regen.absent_element: situation when the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator-initiated command
regen.new_specification: The sequence shall be haltered if the status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open, without an operator-initiated command.

regen.absent_element: status change to 'open' without an operator's command
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the sequence if the status of a closure device, which was previously opened at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command.

label: The status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to unknown or open, without an operator-initiated command.
